maqras.text: Diysno, lyudsʹke isnuvannya ye tryvozhne
Yakshcho zatorknutyy neshchastyam, despondent
Yakshcho blahoslovlenyy bahat·stvom, stingy
Krim dlya worshipers
Khto zavzhdy zauvazhuyutʹ yikhni kontaktni molytvy (Salat)
Chastyna yikhnikh hroshey vidkladayetʹsya
Dlya bidnyy ta needy
Vony viryatʹ v Dnyu Vyroku
Vony povaha yikhniy Lord requital
Yikhniy requital Lorda ne vvazhayetʹsya odnoznachnym
Vony derzhatʹ yikhniy chastity
(Vony mayutʹ vidnoshennya) tilʹky z yikhnim podruzhzhyam, abo shcho ye pravovo yikhni
budʹ khto khto porushuye tsi mezhi ye hrishnyk
Ta viruyuchi derzhatʹ yikhnye slovo; vony ye dostovirni
Yikhnye svidchennya ye pravdyve
Vony stiyko zauvazhuyutʹ yikhni kontaktni molytvy (Salat) svoyechasno
Vony zasluzhyly pozytsiyu chesti u Rayu
Shcho keeping tsey khto disbelieved z pryyednuyuchykh vas
Pravoruch, ta livoruch, vony tikayutʹ
Yak budʹ-yaki yim mozhutʹ ochikuvaty vnesty blissful Ray
Nikoly ne; my utvoryly yikh, ta vony znayutʹ z yakoho
ya urochysto prysyahayu Lordom skhodu ta zakhodu; my vmiyemo
shchob zaminyty krashchykh lyudey u vashomu mistsi; my mozhemo nikoly ne buty zavdani porazky
Tomu, dozvolyayutʹ yim pomylku ta hru, do vony zustrichayutʹ denʹ shcho ochikuye yikh
Shcho yavlyaye soboyu denʹ vony vytikayutʹ z graves pospishayuchy, tak, yakby herded do (sacrificial) vivtari
Z yikhnimy ochamy pidkorenyy, sorom nakryye yikh. Shcho yavlyaye soboyu denʹ shcho ochikuye yikh
My poslaly Noah do yoho lyudey: "Vy budete poperedyty vashykh lyudey pered bolisnym retribution afflicts yim
Vin skazav, "O moyi lyudy, ya ye ochevydnyy warner do vas
Do pylʹnykh vas shcho vy budete obozhnyuvaty BOHA, Yo povahy, ta bude pidkorytysya meni

Vin todi prostytʹ vas vashi hrikhy ta respite vy dlya predetermined period. Naybilʹsh bezperechno, BOZHE pryznachennya mozhe nikoly ne buty zatrymane, odnoho razu yomu musytʹ, yakshcho vy tilʹky znaly
Vin skazav, "Miy Lord, ya zaprosyv moyikh lyudey nich ta denʹ
Ale moye zaproshennya tilʹky zbilʹshylo yikhnyu antypatiyu
Koly "zavhodno ya zaprosyv yikh buty proshchenyy Vamy, vony rozmistyly yikhni palʹtsi u yikhnikh vushrakh, nakrytykh sebe z yikhnim odyahom, napolyahaly, ta povernulysya zukhvali
Todi ya zaprosyv yikh suspilʹno
Todi ya proholosyv yim holosno, ta ya rozmovlyav z nymy pryvatno
ya skazav, `implore vash Lord dlya forgiveness; Vin Probachaye
he bude todi zlyva vy velykodushno z doshchem
and zabezpechuyete vas z hroshamy ta ditʹmy, ta fruktovymy sadamy, ta potokamy
Chomu vy ne musyte doklasty zusylʹ do BOHA povahy
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto utvoryv vas u étapiv
vy ne zdiysnyuyete shcho BOH utvoryv sim vsesvit u verstvakh
Vin zamyslyv misyatsʹ tam buty svitlo, ta rozmistylo sontse buty lampa
Ta BOH germinated vy z zemli lyubyte zavody
Todi Vin prybutky vy u tse, ta Vin bezsumnivno prynese vam
BOH zrobyv habitable zemli dlya vas
Shcho vy mozhete pobuduvaty dorohy tam
Noah skazav, "Miy Lord, vony ne pidkoryalysya meni, ta proslidkuvaly za tsymy khto navitʹ bilʹshe korumpuvalysʹ koly blahoslovlenyy z hroshamy ta ditʹmy
Vony zamyslyly strashni skhemy
Vony skazaly, `do ne pokydayutʹ vashykh bohiv. Ne pokynʹte Wadd, Suwaa`, Yaghouth, Ya`ooq, ta Nasr
Vony pryzvely do pomylky bahato. Tomu, dozvolenyy bezputnyy porynayutʹ bilʹsh hlybokyy u vtratu
Vnaslidok yikhnikh hrikhiv vony buly potonuti ta buly pryznacheni do hellfire. Vony ne znayshly helpers shchob zakhystyty yikh z BOHA
Noah takozh skazav, "Miy Lord, ne vid'yidzhayutʹ yedynyy disbeliever na zemli
Dlya yakshcho vy dozvolyayete yim, vony tilʹky pryzvedutʹ do pomylky vashi sluzhbovtsi ta rozhayutʹ nichoho ale bezputnyy disbelievers
Miy Lord, probachayutʹ meni ta moyi batʹky, ta budʹ khto khto vstupaye miy domashniy yak viruyuchyy, ta vesʹ viryachyy lyudyam ta zhinkam. Ale ne dayutʹ disbelievers budʹ shcho ale znyshchennya
